title: How the ranked system works (flex)
body: If I was to win say 8/10 or 10/10 placement matches in flex would I get placed in silver considering being placed in b3 or b2 last time?

replies.body: Vast majority get placed a little lower than their end of season rank. It seems you've already finished your placements and discovered that however. For a B3 end of season rank, B5 is well within expected.
Ok fair enough I did however get placed b1 last season and was 1 win off silver

Placed or ended? Fresh accounts start a little differently, but where you were placed last season has no impact on your placement this season. OP.GG tells me you ended last season at B3, that's the rank that matters, not your season high.
